entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind south 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
